fields.inlineHelpText: Name of client account
fields.label: Account
fields.name: H2S__Account__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If project expenses (e.g., travel) are included in the budget, then check this box.
fields.label: Budget includes project expenses
fields.name: H2S__BudgetIncludesProjectExpenses__c

fields.inlineHelpText: How is budgeting done for this project?
fields.label: Budget
fields.name: H2S__Budget__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Time Logged / Total Hour Budget
fields.label: Burn %
fields.name: H2S__BurnPercent__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Logged Hours / Budgeted Hours
fields.label: Burn
fields.name: H2S__Burn__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Contact record who is serving as our point-contact at the Client for this project.
fields.label: Client Project Manager
fields.name: H2S__ClientProjectManager__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the project was completed.  Used to stop ticker on Project Days.
fields.label: Date Completed
fields.name: H2S__DateCompleted__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the project was officially started.  Used to calculate Project Days.
fields.label: Date Started
fields.name: H2S__DateStarted__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Number of days since an activity (task, email, call notes, event, etc.) has been logged against this project
fields.label: Days Since Last Activity
fields.name: H2S__DaysSinceLastActivity__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Number of days since a time card has been logged.
fields.label: Days Since Time Last Logged
fields.name: H2S__DaysSinceTimeLastLogged__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Harvest's Unique ID for the Harvest Project. ID can retrieved from the the URL of Harvest's project screen. It will be automatically populated if you do NOT have the Sync with Harvest Project ID checked in the Settings tab or you must populate manually.
fields.label: Harvest Project ID
fields.name: H2S__HarvestProjectID__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Name of related Opportunity
fields.label: Opportunity
fields.name: H2S__Opportunity__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If project budget reaches this percentage, send email alerts.  Leave blank to disable alerts
fields.label: % of Budget Alert
fields.name: H2S__PercentOfBudgetAlert__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If your Harvest project already has a PROJECT CODE, enter the project code here to use the code in Harvest as the external key. If you leave this field blank, then populate the Project Code in Harvest with the auto-generated Project Code from this record.
fields.label: Project Code External Id
fields.name: H2S__ProjectCodeExternalId__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Auto-assigned project ID.  Used to sync to Harvest.
fields.label: Project Code
fields.name: H2S__ProjectCode__c

fields.calculatedFormula: if( ISBLANK( H2S__DateCompleted__c ) ,today()- H2S__DateStarted__c , H2S__DateCompleted__c -  H2S__DateStarted__c )
fields.inlineHelpText: Days from Date Started to Dated Completed (or TODAY if project is still active)
fields.label: Project Days
fields.name: H2S__ProjectDays__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If this is a billable by a project hourly rate, what is the rate?  Leave blank otherwise.
fields.label: Project Hourly Rate
fields.name: H2S__ProjectHourlyRate__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If this is a billable project, how do we invoice for this project?
fields.label: Project invoiced by
fields.name: H2S__ProjectInvoicedBy__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Notes are displayed on the complete project report in Harvest and, only administrator or a project manager can see them.
fields.label: Project Notes
fields.name: H2S__ProjectNotes__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicate where in the work cycle we are with this Project
fields.label: Project Stage
fields.name: H2S__ProjectStage__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Type of project
fields.label: Project Type
fields.name: H2S__ProjectType__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates the status of pairing the salesforce.co HarvestProject record to an associated Project record in Harvest.
fields.label: Sync Status
fields.name: H2S__SyncStatus__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If this project is budgeted based on total fees, what is the total fee budget?  Leave blank otherwise.
fields.label: Total Project Fees
fields.name: H2S__TotalProjectFees__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If this project is budgeted by hours, what is the budget in hours for the project.  Leave blank otherwise.
fields.label: Total Project Hours
fields.name: H2S__TotalProjectHours__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the first time card was logged.
fields.label: Earliest Time Logged
fields.name: H2S__EarliestTimeLogged__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Time cards which have been marked as "invoiced" (lock) in Harvest.
fields.label: Invoiced Time
fields.name: H2S__InvoicedTime__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Most recent date of time cards logged.
fields.label: Last Time Logged
fields.name: H2S__LastTimeLogged__c

fields.inlineHelpText: number of time cards created by HarvestSync and manually.
fields.label: # of Entries
fields.name: H2S__NoOfEntries__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Total of time cards logged in Harvest (both invoiced and uninvoiced)
fields.label: Total Time
fields.name: H2S__TotalTime__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Total of time cards in Harvest which are NOT marked as invoiced.
fields.label: Uninvoiced Time
fields.name: H2S__UninvoicedTime__c
